forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 7 to 15 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 56. Northwest wind 7 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 43 mph.

weather_report:
In downtown San Francisco this afternoon, the weather invites you to bask in serene clarity. The sun shines brightly overhead, casting a gentle warmth that beckons you to step outside. Temperatures hover around a delightful 67 degrees, but as the afternoon unfolds, a cool breeze begins to settle in, hinting at the marine layer that lingers along the coast. The vistas reveal a city free of fog, with the Golden Gate Bridge standing proudly against the backdrop of a radiant sky, complemented by wispy clouds that only enhance the day's beauty.

As evening approaches, a tranquil calm continues under mostly clear skies, though you may notice the winds picking up—a reminder of the northwesterly breezes that can sometimes carry a chill. With a low expected around 56 degrees, dressing in layers is advisable; perhaps a light jacket or sweater for when the sun begins to dip below the hills. As the day unfolds, consider a leisurely stroll along the waterfront, where the vibrant hues of the sunset will paint the sky, or perhaps an afternoon coffee at a cozy café, watching the rhythm of the city pulse around you.
